thread.section_title: Diesel Ops Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Diesel Ops | dieselops.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: The initial customer service was great and speedy. Once the packages arrived, we started installation (Friday night). There were some missing pieces in one of the kits and the programmer power cord didn't work. After speaking with customer service the following Monday (not open on weekends), they credited me store credit for missing bolts and got me in touch with RaceMe for the new cord. The guys were very helpful.
